props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by asChild.

props.name: asChild
props.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When true, prevents the user from interacting with the toggle.

props.name: value
props.description: A string value for the toggle group item. All items within a toggle group should use a unique value.
